attributes.action: Allow driving tests to go ahead during lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
This for many people is essential, parents need to take their kids to school, people need to work and many more reasons. 
I understand the safety issue as you cannot socially distance in a car, but say lockdown ended on the 18th of March it’s ‘unsafe’ to do your test but on the 19th it’s safe. 

Even if learners are required to get a negative COVID-19 test before there test goes ahead. 

Everyone needs freedom and having a driving license can bring this to people. 

Please consider this
attributes.background: I have made this petition for the government to consider still allowing driving tests to go ahead in lockdown.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
